name: RedVoxel³
description:
The Game Inside The Game! Take part in a thoughful puzzle game where you control a platform one! Become Voxel, a little red cube that controls himself in the game and outside the game!

  • Use the outside Voxel and go to the keys to control the MetaPlayer!
  • Solve Puzzles using the OutsideWorld and the Inside World!

Avaiable in Exe and in HTML5.
